00008 public:

00010   static void convertRGBImageToCIELab(DImage &imgDst, const DImage &imgSrc);

00015   static void convertHSVImageToRGB(DImage &imgDst, const DImage &imgSrc);

00031 inline void DColorSpace::getCIELabFromRGB(D_uint8 R, D_uint8 G, D_uint8 B,
00032             float *L, float *a, float *b){
00033   float fltR, fltG, fltB;
00034   float X, Y, Z;
00035   const float XYZn = 1440.954; // since Xn==Yn==Zn, I just use a single const
00036 
00037   fltR = (float)R;
00038   fltG = (float)G;
00039   fltB = (float)B;
00040   X = 2.769*fltR + 1.7518*fltG + 1.13*fltB;
00041   Y = fltR + 4.5907*fltG + 0.0601*fltB;
00042   Z = 0.0565*fltG + 5.5943*fltB;
00043   
00044   (*L) = (float)(116. * cbrt(Y / XYZn) - 16.);
00045   (*a) = (float)(500. * (cbrt(X / XYZn) - cbrt(Y / XYZn)));
00046   (*b) = (float)(200. * (cbrt(Y / XYZn) - cbrt(Z / XYZn)));
00047 }
00048 
00050 inline void DColorSpace::getRGBFromCIELab(float L, float a, float b,
00051             D_uint8 *R, D_uint8 *G, D_uint8 *B){
00052   int iR, iG, iB;
00053   float Xreverse, Yreverse, Zreverse;
00054   float fltTmpX;
00055   float fltTmpY;
00056   float fltTmpZ;
00057   const float XYZn = 1440.954f; // since Xn==Yn==Zn, I just use a single const
00058 
00059   fltTmpY = (L+16.f)/116.f;
00060   Yreverse = XYZn * fltTmpY * fltTmpY * fltTmpY;
00061   fltTmpX = a / 500.f + cbrt(Yreverse / XYZn);
00062   Xreverse = XYZn * fltTmpX * fltTmpX * fltTmpX;
00063   fltTmpZ = cbrt(Yreverse/XYZn) - b / 200.f;
00064   Zreverse = XYZn * fltTmpZ * fltTmpZ * fltTmpZ;
00065 
00066   iR = (int)nearbyintf(0.4184383528f * Xreverse + -0.158655799f * Yreverse +
00067            -0.0828164605f * Zreverse);
00068   iG = (int)nearbyintf(-0.0911611925f * Xreverse + 0.2524253419f * Yreverse +
00069            0.0157019438f * Zreverse);
00070   iB = (int)nearbyintf(0.0009206884461f * Xreverse + -0.0025493863f * Yreverse
00071            + 0.1785947912f * Zreverse);
00072   // cap the range between 0 and 255 (inclusive)
00073   if(iR < 0)
00074     iR = 0;
00075   if(iR > 255)
00076     iR = 255;
00077 
00078   if(iG < 0)
00079     iG = 0;
00080   if(iG > 255)
00081     iG = 255;
00082 
00083   if(iB < 0)
00084     iB = 0;
00085   if(iB > 255)
00086     iB = 255;
00087 
00088   (*R) = (D_uint8)iR;
00089   (*G) = (D_uint8)iG;
00090   (*B) = (D_uint8)iB;
00091 }

00096 inline void DColorSpace::getHSVFromRGB(D_uint8 R, D_uint8 G, D_uint8 B,
00097                float *H, float *S, float *V){
00098   float max, min, delta;
00099   max = min = (float)R;
00100   if(G > max)
00101     max = G;
00102   else if(G < min)
00103     min = G;
00104   if(B > max)
00105     max = B;
00106   else if(B < min)
00107     min = B;
00108   
00109   (*V) = max / 255.;
00110   (*S) = (0.f != max) ? ((max-min) / max) : 0.f;
00111   if(0.f == (*S)){
00112     (*H) = 0.f; // hue is undefined when S==0, but set to 0 for convenience
00113   }
00114   else{
00115     delta = max - min;
00116     if(max == (float)R){
00117       (*H) = (G - B) / delta;
00118     }
00119     else if(max == (float)G){
00120       (*H) = 2.f + (B-R) / delta;
00121     }
00122     else{ // max is B
00123       (*H) = 4.f + (R-G) / delta;
00124     }
00125     (*H) *= 60.f;
00126     if((*H) < 0.f)
00127       (*H) += 360.f;
00128   }
00129 }
00131 
00133 inline void DColorSpace::getRGBFromHSV(float H, float S, float V,
00134                D_uint8 *R, D_uint8 *G, D_uint8 *B){
00135   if(0.f == S){ // gray value
00136     (*R) = (*G) = (*B) = (D_uint8)(255.f*V);
00137 #ifdef DEBUG
00138 //     if(H != 361.361f){
00139 //       fprintf(stderr, "DColorSpace::getRGBFromHSV() bad hue value for gray\n");
00140 //     }
00141 #endif
00142   }
00143   else{
00144     float f,p,q,t;
00145     int i;
00146     if(360.f == H)
00147       H = 0.f;
00148     H /= 60.f;
00149     i = (int)H;
00150     f = H-i;
00151     V *= 255.f;
00152     p = V * (1.f-S);
00153     q = V * (1.f-(S*f));
00154     t = V * (1.f-(S*(1.f-f)));
00155     switch(i){
00156       case 0: (*R) = (D_uint8)V; (*G) = (D_uint8)t; (*B) = (D_uint8)p; break;
00157       case 1: (*R) = (D_uint8)q; (*G) = (D_uint8)V; (*B) = (D_uint8)p; break;
00158       case 2: (*R) = (D_uint8)p; (*G) = (D_uint8)V; (*B) = (D_uint8)t; break;
00159       case 3: (*R) = (D_uint8)p; (*G) = (D_uint8)q; (*B) = (D_uint8)V; break;
00160       case 4: (*R) = (D_uint8)t; (*G) = (D_uint8)p; (*B) = (D_uint8)V; break;
00161       case 5: (*R) = (D_uint8)V; (*G) = (D_uint8)p; (*B) = (D_uint8)q; break;
00162       default:
00163   fprintf(stderr,
00164     "DColorSpace::getRGBFromHSV() bad logic in switch %d\n",i);
00165   break;
00166     }
00167   }
00168 }
